Package com.rays.common

Interface BaseDAOInt<T extends BaseDTO>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the DTO that extends BaseDTO
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AttachmentDAOInt, ClientDAOInt, CollegeDAOInt, CourseDAOInt, DeceaseDAOInt, DoctorDAOInt, FacultyDAOInt, FollowupDAOInt, InventoryDAOInt, IssueDAOInt, JobDAOInt, MarksheetDAOInt, MessageDAOInt, OrderDAOInt, OwnerDAOInt, PaymentDAOInt, PrescriptionDAOInt, RoleDAOInt, RouteDAOInt, ShoppingCartDAOInt, StudentDAOInt, SubjectDAOInt, SupplierDAOInt, TimeTableDAOInt, TransportationDAOInt, UserDAOInt, VehicleDAOInt, WishListDAOInt
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttachmentDAOImpl, BaseDAOImpl, ClientDAOImpl, CollegeDAOImpl, CourseDAOImpl, DeceaseDAOImpl, DoctorDAOImpl, FacultyDAOImpl, FollowupDAOImpl, InventoryDAOImpl, IssueDAOImp, JobDAOImp, MarksheetDAOImpl, MessageDAOImpl, OrderDAOImpl, OwnerDAOImpl, PaymentDAOImpl, PrescriptionDAOImpl, RoleDAOImpl, RouteDAOImp, ShoppingCartDAOImpl, StudentDAOImpl, SubjectDAOImpl, SupplierDAOImpl, TimeTableDAOImpl, TransportationDAOImp, UserDAOImpl, VehicleDAOImp, WishListDAOImpl
    public interface BaseDAOInt<T extends BaseDTO>
    Base DAO interface for common data operations.

      • search

        java.util.List<T> search​(T dto,
                         int pageNo,
                         int pageSize,
                         UserContext userContext)
        Searches for records with pagination.
        Parameters:
        dto - The DTO used for searching
        pageNo - The page number for pagination
        pageSize - The number of records per page
        userContext - The context of the user performing the operation
        Returns:
        A list of records matching the search criteria
